TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementEventWatcher extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 訂閱暫時性事件告知，該告知以指定的「事件查詢」為基礎。

span.span: Subscribes to temporary event notifications based on a specified *event query*.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/cs/ManagementEventWatcher.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/vb/ManagementEventWatcher.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 如需進一步初始化，請設定物件上的屬性。

span.span: For further initialization, set the properties on the object.

summary.span: 這是預設建構函式。

span.span: This is the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/cs/ManagementEventWatcher.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/vb/ManagementEventWatcher.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when given a WMI *event query*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中監看員會接聽事件是目前設定的預設命名空間。The namespace in which the watcher will be listening for events is the default namespace that is currently set. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 在此程式碼範例中，用戶端會收到通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。In this code example, the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher-E#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher-E/cs/ManagementEventWatcher-E.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher-E#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher-E/vb/ManagementEventWatcher-E.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中監看員會接聽事件是目前設定的預設命名空間。The namespace in which the watcher will be listening for events is the default namespace that is currently set. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. param.name: scope
param.span: ，表示監看員將會在其中接聽事件的範圍 (命名空間)。

param.span: ，表示會判斷監看員將接聽之事件的 WMI 事件查詢。

summary.span: 根據指定的選項，初始化 類別 (會接聽與指定的 WMI 事件查詢相符的事件) 的新執行個體。

summary.span: 這個變數的查詢和範圍是指定的物件。

summary.span: 選項物件可以指定選項 (例如，逾時和內容資訊)。

span.span: The options object can specify options such as time-out and context information.

summary.span: 發生於新的事件到達時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件的作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得傳遞的 WMI 事件。Gets the WMI event that was delivered.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

span.span: Returns an that contains the event options used to watch for events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 用來監看事件的選項。The options used to watch for events. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Options#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Options/cs/ManagementEventWatcher_Options.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Options#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Options/vb/ManagementEventWatcher_Options.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::EventQuery ^ Query { System::Management::EventQuery ^ get(); void set(System::Management::EventQuery ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至事件的準則。

span.span: Gets or sets the criteria to apply to events.

value.span: 傳回 ，內含要套用至事件的查詢。

span.span: Returns an that contains the query to apply to events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 要套用到事件，也就是等於的準則*事件查詢*。The criteria to apply to the events, which is equal to the *event query*. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. summary.span: 以指定的查詢訂閱事件，並以非同步方式，經由 事件傳遞。

span.span: Subscribes to events with the given query and delivers them, asynchronously, through the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 取消同步或非同步 (Asynchronous) 訂閱。

span.span: Cancels the subscription whether it is synchronous or asynchronous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. summary.span: 發生於訂閱取消時。

span.span: Occurs when a subscription is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件的作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得作業的完成狀態。Gets the completion status of the operation.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Management.ManagementBaseObject WaitForNextEvent() cil managed

summary.span: 等待與指定查詢相符的下一個事件到達，然後將其傳回。

span.span: Waits for the next event that matches the specified query to arrive, and then returns it.
A representing the newly arrived event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件監看員物件包含選項，以指定的逾時，API 會等待下一個事件只會針對指定的時間; 數量否則下, 一個事件發生之前，將會封鎖應用程式開發介面。If the event watcher object contains options with a specified time-out, the API will wait for the next event only for the specified amount of time; otherwise, the API will be blocked until the next event occurs. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent/cs/ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent/vb/ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent.vb#1)]
